Name: Steel Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Ground-type moves from damaging Steel-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Steel-type Pokémon.  You can get a Steel Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: an Iron Silk, a Steel Dust, and a Metal Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
